content.p:
ยง 11-218. Application of other provisions. 1. Except as otherwise
provided in this title, special federal ballots shall be furnished,
mailed, voted, returned, counted, canvassed and preserved as elsewhere
provided in this chapter for absentee voters' ballots.
 2. Except as otherwise provided in this title, all the provisions of
this chapter with respect to registration, enrollment, special
enrollment, correction of enrollment and change of enrollment shall be
deemed to apply with respect to and in connection with the operation of
this title.
 3. All the provisions of this chapter relating to crimes against the
elective franchise shall be deemed to apply with respect to and in
connection with the operation of this title.
 4. The general provisions of this chapter shall apply with respect to
this title except as they are inconsistent with this title, and the
provisions of this title shall be construed liberally for the purposes
herein expressed or intended.
